org.grouplens.mooc.cbf

Class TFIDFModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.mooc.cbf.TFIDFModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Shareable
@DefaultProvider(value=TFIDFModelBuilder.class)
public class TFIDFModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The model for a TF-IDF recommender. The model just remembers the normalized tag vector for each item.
    See Also:
    TFIDFModelBuilder, Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector getItemVector(long item)
      Get the tag vector for a particular item.
      org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.MutableSparseVector newTagVector()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • newTagVector

        public org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.MutableSparseVector newTagVector()
        Create a new mutable vector over all tag IDs. The vector is initially empty, and its key domain is the set of all tag IDs.
        Returns:
        A fresh vector over tag IDs.

      • getItemVector

        public org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector getItemVector(long item)
        Get the tag vector for a particular item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        Returns:
        The item's tag vector. If the item is not known to the model, then this vector is empty.
